name: mri_cvs_check
author: FreeSurfer Developers
description: Checks whether the files required for mri_cvs_register all exist.

inputs.description: Subject id for the subject to be moved/registered (Should be present in SUBJECTS_DIR).
inputs.name: Moving Subject ID

inputs.description: Subject id for the template subject to be kept fixed. If missing, CVS template is assumed as a target.
inputs.name: Template Subject ID

inputs.description: The hemisphere that is going to be processed. It can be 'lh' or 'rh'.
inputs.name: Hemisphere
